claim: Investment funds are also referred to as collective investment schemes.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Terminology varies with country but investment funds are often referred to as investment pools , collective investment vehicles , collective investment schemes , managed funds , or simply funds .

claim: Investment funds are also referred to as collective investment schemes.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Managing Partners Limited  (  MPL  )  is a multi-disciplined investment house that manages a range of collective investment schemes and regulated mutual funds investing in absolute return and other alternative asset classes .

claim: Investment funds are also referred to as collective investment schemes.
premise_source_doc_sentence: MPL is a member of The Alternative Investment Management Association Limited  (  `` AIMA ''  )  and is registered in the Cayman Islands where it is recognised by the Cayman Islands Monetary Authority as a mutual fund manager where it manages a number of collective investment schemes and regulated mutual funds .

claim: Investment funds are also referred to as collective investment schemes.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Similarly , although the reference to fund can be taken to include any sort of collective investment , within offshore jurisdictions themselves , the term offshore fund is often limited to purely open-ended investment funds  (  i.e. a fund where the investor can redeem his investment during the life of the fund  )  where the investment is by way of equity  (  rather than by debt  )  .
